level.heading: MATTERS NOT ADDRESSED BY THESE RULES (ยง 7-1545)

level.text: Any matter not addressed in these rules shall be governed by Robert’s Rules of Order, or, if not addressed in Robert’s Rules of Order, by the decision of the Parliamentarian subject to the right of appeal by any Board member pursuant to ยง1519.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 10811 (November 29, 2002).
